Revision History

Revision 1

  • Mac HIView: better description on how to get the editor to work on 2.3 hosts (see Macintosh Editor as HIViewRef)
  • MIDI Events: better description for kVstMidiEventIsRealtime, AudioEffectX::getNumMidiInputChannels and AudioEffectX::getNumMidiOutputChannels
  • Build ppc Mac Plug-Ins with VST_FORCE_DEPRECATED=0
  • vst_strncat () bug fixed
  • Windows: fixed drawtest project file for new zlib/libpng versions (zlib: 1.1.3 -> 1.2.3, libpng: 1.2.5 -> 1.2.8)
  • fixed some minor bugs in VSTGUI and drawtest sample
  • updated vstfxstore.h
